com.github.michaelbull.rs.ge

Class GraphingData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.michaelbull.rs.ge.GraphingData

  • public final class GraphingData
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the data used to graphically display an Items price history on the RuneScape GrandExchange.
    See Also:
    Graphing Data

      • getDailyPrice

        public java.util.OptionalInt getDailyPrice(java.time.LocalDate dateTime)
        Gets the daily price of an Item on a given a LocalDate on the UTC time-zone.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - The LocalDate.
        Returns:
        An OptionalInt containing the price, or OptionalInt.empty() if no daily value was recorded on this date.
